messages.text:
John McCain was an American politician and United States Navy officer who served as a United States senator from Arizona from 1987 until his death in 2018[^1^]. He was also the Republican nominee for president of the United States in the 2008 election, which he lost to Barack Obama[^2^]. He was known as a political maverick who often clashed with his party's right wing on various issues[^2^]. He was also a war hero who survived being a prisoner of war in Vietnam for more than five years[^2^] [^3^].

If you want to learn more about his political positions

body.text:
[1]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_McCain "John McCain - Wikipedia"
[2]: https://www.britannica.com/biography/John-McCain "John McCain | Biography, Vietnam Experience, Political ... - Britannica"
[3]: https://ballotpedia.org/John_McCain "John McCain - Ballotpedia"
[4]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Political_positions_of_John_McCain "Political positions of John McCain - Wikipedia"

John McCain was an American politician and United States Navy officer who served as a United States senator from Arizona from 1987 until his death in 2018[^1^][1]. He was also the Republican nominee for president of the United States in the 2008 election, which he lost to Barack Obama[^2^][2]. He was known as a political maverick who often clashed with his party's right wing on various issues[^2^][2]. He was also a war hero who survived being a prisoner of war in Vietnam for more than five years[^2^][2] [^3^][3].

If you want to learn more about his political positions
